parameters.query: INSERT INTO audit_logs (execution_id, workflow_name, status, records_processed, end_time) VALUES ('{{ $json.executionId }}', 'data-reporter', 'success', {{ $json.summary.totalRecords }}, NOW())

UPDATE workflow_metrics SET total_executions = total_executions + 1, successful_executions = successful_executions + 1, last_execution = NOW(), success_rate = (successful_executions::float / total_executions * 100) WHERE workflow_name = 'data-pipeline'
